mapper.select: SELECT hv.reg_id AS registerId, hv.id_no AS idNo, hv.name AS name, hv.ct_id AS certTypeId, hv.subject AS subjectId, hv.cert_no AS certNo, hv.nation AS nationId, hv.sex AS genderId, hv.birthday AS birthday, hv.cert_assign AS certAssignDate, hv.org_name AS recognizeOrgName FROM t_history_valid hv WHERE hv.reg_id = #{registerId}
